mapper.select: SELECT u.*, GROUP_CONCAT(r.code) as role_codes FROM users u LEFT JOIN user_roles ur ON u.id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.id WHERE u.username = #{username} AND u.deleted = 0 GROUP BY u.id
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = #{username} AND deleted = 0
SELECT DISTINCT p.code FROM permissions p INNER JOIN role_permissions rp ON p.id = rp.permission_id INNER JOIN user_roles ur ON rp.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId}
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = #{userId} AND token_sign = #{tokenSign} AND deleted = 0
